actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to discontinue assessment of reclamation fees for certain reclaimed coal, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to prohibit a reclamation fee for coal reclaimed from specified coal deposits that were removed from their original geological location before August 3, 1977, or from specified waste material sites.

titles.title: A bill to discontinue assessment of reclamation fees for certain reclaimed coal, and for other purposes.
